extends AbstractStatement

    Roman Rokytskyy, Mark Rotteveel

      • getParentLogger

        public java.util.logging.Logger getParentLogger()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLFeatureNotSupportedException
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLFeatureNotSupportedException

      • getLargeUpdateCount

        public long getLargeUpdateCount()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support large update counts, the return value of this method is the same as AbstractStatement.getUpdateCount().

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setLargeMaxRows

        public void setLargeMaxRows(long max)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support maxRows exceeding Integer.MAX_VALUE, if a larger value is set, Jaybird will add a warning to the statement and reset the maximum to 0.

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getLargeMaxRows

        public long getLargeMaxRows()
                     throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support maxRows exceeding Integer.MAX_VALUE, the return value of this method is the same as AbstractStatement.getMaxRows().

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • executeLargeBatch

        public long[] executeLargeBatch()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support update counts exceeding Integer.MAX_VALUE, this method calls AbstractStatement.executeBatch() and converts the int-array to a long-array.

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • executeLargeUpdate

        public long executeLargeUpdate(java.lang.String sql)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support update counts exceeding Integer.MAX_VALUE, this method calls AbstractStatement.executeUpdate(String).

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • executeLargeUpdate

        public long executeLargeUpdate(java.lang.String sql,
                               int autoGeneratedKeys)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support update counts exceeding Integer.MAX_VALUE, this method calls AbstractStatement.executeUpdate(String,int).

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • executeLargeUpdate

        public long executeLargeUpdate(java.lang.String sql,
                               int[] columnIndexes)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        Jaybird does not support update counts exceeding Integer.MAX_VALUE, this method calls AbstractStatement.executeUpdate(String,int[]).

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
